item.title: Demo
item.description: 嘻嘻哈哈，blah blah! Java snippet 1 2 3 4 5 public class HelloWorld { public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println("Hello world!"); } } Clojure snippet 1 2 (defn -main [& args] (println "Hello world!")) Rust snippet 1 2 3 fn main() { println!("Hello, world!"); }
